name: Tic Tac Go
description:
Tic Tac Go

Can you win against the robot in a game of Tic Tac Toe?

Made with: Godot

Entry for 100$ CodeGame Challenge. It was a fun challenge and I managed to make something in time. Hope you like it :)

Instructions

Move: Arrow Keys

Interaction and UI: Z Button

Other: Mouse

Credits
